page.title: 18Whitchurch Village- Features
page.content: Whitchurch is a village just outside Tavistock. In it there is a pub,a church,a garage and 2 schools, one for Infants and one for Juniors. The{Post Office}is a general store.It has very long opening hours, opening at 6.30a.m. It is also an off-licence. * * * * * * * * * * The{pub}is owned by the Church and is next to it.Both buildings have been there for 800 years.The pub has a {tithe window and a clone oven. The church services gather between 15 - 100 people. The Junior{School}was built in 1983: 140 attend it but the school will eventually hold 200.There are 5 teachers,and 30 children in a class.The children are 7-11 years. The Bishopsmead housing estate has recently increased the population.
